Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to read out the data in HTC Desire SMS backup file?  I made a backup of my SMSes before doing a reset on my phone HTC Desire S (Android 2.3.5; HTC sense 3.0) to my SD card.Now I cant restore it, there are 6000+ SMSes in it, but the restore works for hours and doesn't go past the 2300 SMSes. I've even tried to let it run for hours.I've tried to open the backed up file with SQLite Database Browser, but it shows me an error saying that is not an SQLite database file.Is there any solution, how to open/restore the file? I tried many apps related to backup/restore category.
Title: How to open or fully import a previously made backup file of SMSes?

history.Text: I made sms backup before I made reset on my phone HTC Desire S (Android 2.3.5 ; HTC sense 3.0) to my SD card. Now I cant restore it, there are 6000+ sms, but the restore works hours ( it restored all night - 9h, but cant restore more thane 2300, I tryed more time). I tried open backed up file with [SQLite Database Browser][1], but shows error, that is not sqlite db file.Is there any solution, how to open/restore the file? I tried many apps related to backup/restore category.Thanks for any help, and idea!  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/15645/how-to-read-out-the-data-in-htc-desire-sms-backup-file
How to open or read backed up sms file
